item.title: GitLab Data Loss: A Discussion
item.description: In case you missed the big news in the industry this week, a GitLab employee accidentally deleted a ton of production data and took their platform down for hours. It was only when everything was on fire and they were in deep trouble that they turned to their backup systemsâ€¦ only to find that none of them actually worked.

item.title: Developers Shouldn't Measure Twice, Cut Once
item.description: I was working on my fireplace this past weekend. Specifically I had just finished ripping down the old surface to the red brick, and then preparing the brick surface with a layer of thinset for tiling.
